column5: Me and the wife decide to hit crystal beach to do some bass fishing to give her some practise for the upcoming guys and gals tourny, boy she did not dissappoint me, handled it like a pro, and out fished the sh@#$T out of me LOL. Although there was and instance when those long rolling ways were getting the best of her , but she held in there like a champ, sure can't wait till next weekend.Not much size but we had great numbers, very lite bite and they were hugging the bottom.
nice fish.....where is crystal beach?? is that lake erie or lake st clair?? or neither?

nice going on the bass fishin,...hate to break it ya but when bringing the women fishin, they almost always outfish the boys..half the reason I think for this is the guys don't have time to get thier line in there because they are too busy fixing the girl's tangles and baiting hooks
Some nice bass. Good to see your wife enjoying the sport with you.
Great report....I'm outfished regularly by the women in my life.  I just have to swallow my pride and pretend I'm still enjoying myself...LOL.  Good luck!
Great report and pics walleyemen    or should I say Mrs walleyemen  Kuddos to Mrs walleyemen for kicking your Looks like a great time on the water....WTG you guys  Thanks for sharing Leechman
